Line1.11F5A1: Symon tried to convince us to join them. He said they sought sacred and hidden knowledge.
Line3.11F5A1: I didn't believe that, and I tried to convince Symon to remain with us. He didn't listen.
Line5.11F5A1: He said if we changed our minds, they were venturing east, to an underground camp marked by tusks in the marshes.
